name: electron-markdwon-editor
description: markdown editor, support for export pdf and html

scripts.package-win: npm run set-env && electron-packager . electron-tutorial-app --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=assets/icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName=CE --version-string.FileDescription=CE --version-string.ProductName="Todo List App"

author: YUE LI
